Comment.Language: For the Entrance of the Lord Christ into the Land of Egypt on the Feast of the Pentecost:

Text.Language: V/e~taftwnf ouoh afsenaf afouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton Pip~neuma n~te ]meym/i: afi~ e~qoun e~t,wra n~,/mi: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who has risen and ascended and sent to us the Paraclete, Spirit of truth, entered into the land of Egypt. Save us and have mercy on us.
الذي قام ثم صعد وأرسل البارقليط روح الحق, دخل الي كورة مصر. خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Pentecost:

Text.Language: V/e~taftwnf ouoh afsenaf afouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton Pip~neuma n~te ]meym/i: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who has risen and ascended and sent to us the Paraclete, the Spirit of truth. Save us and have mercy on us.
الذي قام ثم صعد وأرسل البارقليط روح الحق. خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
